title: [OLD] Nine years of Modi government: What India witnessed & how its economy has changed - The Economic Times
selftext: Modi government has changed India and mostly for the better.
comments:
To be honest, he is a Vishwaguru, so he can do more this in his sleep. 

The problem for India is that he does not sleep or we could have achieved more.
